title: Slum areas declared as slums under section 4 of the Maharashtra Slum Areas (Improvement, Clearance and Redevelopment) Act, 1971 or slums on Public lands prior to 1st January, 1995 or such other reference date notified by the Government
clause_text: Slum areas declared as slums under section 4 of the Maharashtra Slum Areas (Improvement, Clearance and Redevelopment) Act, 1971 or slums on Public lands prior to 1st January, 1995 or such other reference date notified by the Government. However such slum area shall be maximum 25% of cluster area;
